description:
[telemetry] Add new benchmarks and rename them all.


BUG=None.
TEST=./run_benchmark list

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=222736

messages.text:
The full list of benchmarks is (not including measurements):

Available tests are:
  blink_perf          
  dom_perf             A suite of JavaScript benchmarks for exercising the browser's DOM.
  dromaeo.domcoreattr 
  dromaeo.domcoremodify
  dromaeo.domcorequery
  dromaeo.domcoretraverse
  dromaeo.jslibattrjquery
  dromaeo.jslibattrprototype
  dromaeo.jslibeventjquery
  dromaeo.jslibeventprototype
  dromaeo.jslibmodifyjquery
  dromaeo.jslibmodifyprototype
  dromaeo.jslibstylejquery
  dromaeo.jslibstyleprototype
  dromaeo.jslibtraversejquery
  dromaeo.jslibtraverseprototype
  endure.calendar_forward_backward
  endure.gmail_alt_threadlist_conversation
  endure.gmail_alt_two_labels
  endure.gmail_expand_collapse_conversation
  endure.plus_alt_posts_photos
  image_decoding.image_decoding
  jsgamebench          Counts how many animating sprites can move around on the screen at once.
  kraken               Mozilla's Kraken JavaScript benchmark.
  media.tough_video_cases Obtains media metrics for key user scenarios.
  memory.2012Q3       
  memory.top_25       
  octane               Google's Octane JavaScript benchmark.
  page_cycler.basic_insert
  page_cycler.bloat   
  page_cycler.dhtml   
  page_cycler.intl_ar_fa_he
  page_cycler.intl_es_fr_pt-BR
  page_cycler.intl_hi_ru
  page_cycler.intl_ja_zh
  page_cycler.intl_ko_th_vi
  page_cycler.morejs  
  page_cycler.moz     
  page_cycler.netsim.top_10 Measures load time of the top 10 sites under simulated cable network.
  page_cycler.tough_layout_cases
  page_cycler.typical_25
  pica.pica           
  robohornet_pro      
  smoothness.top_25    Measures rendering statistics while scrolling down the top 25 web pages.
  spaceport            spaceport.io's PerfMarks benchmark.
  startup.cold        
  startup.warm        
  sunspider            Apple's SunSpider JavaScript benchmark.
  tab_switching.top_10

Just two question, else lg

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py
File tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py#newcode10
tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py:10: name = 'cold'
We are planning to add startup tests that start up to things other than the blank page, so I do think it would be appropriate to keep blank_page in the names.

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json
File tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json#oldcode2
tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json:2: "description": "A directed benchmark of image decoding performance",
Won't this break the bots? IIRC, they are still using this with run_measurement + the old name.

PTAL

I added some string matching to the tests. If you do "./run_benchmark domcorea", it'll run dromaeo.domcoreattr. I also added it to list. "./run_benchmark l s" lists all benchmarks that start with "s".

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py
File tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py#newcode10
tools/perf/benchmarks/startup.py:10: name = 'cold'
On 2013/09/11 02:04:05, tonyg wrote:
> We are planning to add startup tests that start up to things other than the
> blank page, so I do think it would be appropriate to keep blank_page in the
> names.

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json
File tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23618042/diff/1/tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json#oldcode2
tools/perf/page_sets/image_decoding_measurement.json:2: "description": "A directed benchmark of image decoding performance",
On 2013/09/11 02:04:05, tonyg wrote:
> Won't this break the bots? IIRC, they are still using this with run_measurement
> + the old name.

You're right. Undone.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/dtu@chromium.org/23618042/11001

subject: [telemetry] Add new benchmarks and rename them all.
